titleStmt.title: The copie of a letter sent ovt of England to an ambassadour in France for the King of Spaine declaring the state of England contrary to the opinion of Don Bernardin and of all his partizans Spaniards and others : wherunto are adioyned certain advertisements concerning the losses and distresses happened to the Spanish navy as well in fight with the English navie in the narrow seas of England : as also by tempests and contrary winds upon the west and north coasts of Ireland in their returne from the northerne isles beyond Scotland.
Copie of a letter sent out of England to Don Bernardin Mendoza
titleStmt.author: Leigh, Richard, 1561?-1588.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Richard Leigh. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
The ambassador to France is Don Bernardin Mendoza.
The advertisements called for on title page were not printed.--Lyell, J. P. R. Spanish Armada.
T.P. of other editions: "found in the chamber of Richard Leigh."
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
